data.title: ▷ Expreso de la Robla train. Route between Bilbao and León
data.meta_description: On the Expreso de la Robla, sit back and relax on board a comfortable vintage train. ▷ Welcome on board the Expreso de la Robla train
data.text:
The train

The cosy classic décor of El Expreso de La Robla invites you to relax and enjoy the pleasure of the trip, both in its berths and in its comfortable lounge cars.

The entire train is connected internally, facilitating the free transit of passengers.

Standard room

Berth with two bunk beds and equipped with bathtub or shower in which every centimetre is used up to ensure passengers enjoy all the comforts.

It has two bunk beds (0.70 x 1.80 m. each), wardrobe, reading light, adjustable air-conditioning and equipped with its own toilet, hydromassage shower, sink, toilet and hairdryer.

Lounge cars

The three lounge cars of El Expreso de La Robla have common spaces in which daily life takes place.

Buffet breakfasts are served here and you can spend your free time reading the newspaper, magazines or a book from our library. It also has a TV and video library. Please note that the bar is open from early dawn and until past midnight.
